summary: Empty issue with no content — accidental creation, immediately closed by author

analysis.summary: Issue has no body, no comments, and a title of 'TO DELETE PLEASE'. It was opened and closed within minutes on the same day. This is an accidental or test issue creation with zero actionable content.

keySignals.interpretation: Author explicitly requests deletion — accidental issue creation
No description, no repro, no question — nothing to act on
Author self-closed immediately, confirming this was unintentional

fieldRationales.expandedReason: No bug, feature, enhancement, or documentation request is described. The issue is empty. 'type/question' is the least-wrong classification for an issue with no actionable content. Low confidence reflects that none of the types truly fit.

alternatives.whyRejected: No broken behavior described — no body at all.

fieldRationales.expandedReason: Issue is already closed with no content. No action is needed. 'close-as-fixed' reflects that the issue lifecycle is complete — there is nothing to investigate, answer, or fix.

uncertainties: Whether the author intended to file a real issue and accidentally submitted early
assumptions: Assumed accidental creation since the issue was self-closed within minutes with no follow-up

actionability.reason: Issue is already closed with no content — no action needed

actions.description: Apply question label to empty issue
actions.reason: Matches classification — no better type fits an empty issue
